item.description:
@leader wrote:

another site? this really doesnt help any community.

ps. no, he wasnt a great person (and so i dont get flamed, im not saying hes a bad person for any reason)
[/quote]
But your saying he wasnt a great person and for that mere personfication of a good member you shall get flamed.[/quote]

He is giving his opinion.
